name: Crystal Caverns (itch)
description:
~ ~ ~ Crystal Caverns ~ ~ ~

Explore the caves, hunt for gems, see what friends you can find below

Made over a weekend at Toronto Game Jam 12

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Click to interact

E to elevator
